meanings.definition: A level of pay for a job or position
meanings.sent1: At his paygrade, he can afford to buy a new car.
meanings.sent2: She was happy to finally reach a higher paygrade at work.
meanings.sent3: The paygrade for the job was so high that it seemed like a dream.
meanings.sent4: Reaching a new paygrade felt like climbing a mountain of success.
meanings.sent5: The paygrade determined how much money he would take home each month.

meanings.definition: To assign a paygrade to a job or position
meanings.sent1: The manager will paygrade the new employees based on their experience.
